name: GS1 Slovakia
memberOrga:
GS1 Slovakia is one of 112 GS1 member organisations with more that 1,000,000 memebers worldwide. 
Locally GS1 Slovakia has around 4000 memebers - legal companies and self-employed.
goal: We empower organisations to grow efficiently, sustainably and safely — helping transform the way we work and live. Our standards enable organisations to identify, capture and share information smoothly, creating a common language that underpins systems and processes all over the world.
euInitiatives: Our focus is currently only on the e-invoicing intiative in EMSFeI and CEN TC 434 groups.
